mapper.select: select a.user_code userCode, a.order_code orderCode, a.goods_code goodsCode, b.goods_name goodsName, a.order_money orderMoney, a.order_sum orderSum, b.sale_price salePrice, a.version version from t_order_detail a left join t_goods b on a.goods_code = b.goods_code where a.order_code = #{orderCode} and a.is_deleted = 0

select a.order_code orderCode, a.order_money orderMoney, a.order_state orderState, a.store_code storeCode, b.user_name userName, b.phone phone, a.pay_time payTime, a.version version from t_order a, t_sys_user b where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.user_code = b.user_code
and b.user_name like concat('%', #{userName} '%')
and a.order_code like concat('%', #{orderCode}, '%')
and b.phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
and a.order_state = #{orderState}
and a.pay_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startPayTime},'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%S')
and a.pay_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endPayTime},'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%S')
order by a.pay_time desc

select a.order_code orderCode, a.order_money orderMoney, a.order_state orderState, a.store_code storeCode, b.user_name userName, b.phone phone, a.pay_time payTime, a.version version from t_order a, t_sys_user b where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.user_code = b.user_code and a.store_code in ( select store_code from t_store where user_code = #{roleCode})
and b.user_name like concat('%', #{userName} '%')
and a.order_code like concat('%', #{orderCode}, '%')
and b.phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
and a.order_state = #{orderState}
and a.pay_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startPayTime},'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%S')
and a.pay_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endPayTime},'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%S')
order by a.pay_time desc
